snippet.title: EX_IFE (Ex Life / Ex Wife) - Indie Game BR (english sub)
snippet.description:
To learn more, follow our social networks at the end of the description.

 Expected to launch in 2020, EX_LIFE / EX_WIFE is a futuristic indie puzzle game, with narrative elements, and survival, in which Enzo, the protagonist, lives in a house controlled by an AI, which controls all the functions of the house and is calibrated with the personality of Brenda, Enzo's ex-wife, and named after her.

  Brenda goes on to become possessive and controlling, limiting Enzo's freedom according to her will and leaving her schedule to serve him in the background. With this Enzo must discover why she is acting in such a way that she must solve the problems that begin to appear, one after the other. So several challenges will arise for the player which will keep you busy most of the time in this enigmatic house.

  The game is expected to launch on PC on November 11, 2020. And has a FREE demo to download now available on Steam.
 We already know that you will buy Cyberpunk 2077, so save your change to take "Ex Life" home, since it will be very cheap.
